archimate:Requirement.name: SA.2.2.4b: b) access control and management procedures (e.g. covering revocation of physical and logical access, and network connectivity, and any procedures associated with managing Federated Identity and Access Management (FIAM))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
